member.name: ID3D11Device1.CreateBlendState1
member.summary: Creates a blend-state object that encapsulates blend state for the output-merger stage and allows the configuration of logic operations.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that describes blend state.
Address of a pointer to the interface for the blend-state object created.
member.returns:
This method returns E_OUTOFMEMORY if there is insufficient memory to create the blend-state object.
See Direct3D 11 Return Codes for other possible return values.

member.name: ID3D11Device1.CreateDeferredContext1
member.summary: Creates a deferred context, which can record command lists.
member.param: Upon completion of the method, the passed pointer to an interface pointer is initialized.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the following:

item.description: Returns DXGI_ERROR_DEVICE_REMOVED if the graphics adapter has been physically removed from the computer or a driver upgrade for the graphics adapter has occurred. If this error occurs, you should destroy and re-create the device.

Returns DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL if the CreateDeferredContext1 method cannot be called from the current context. For example, if the device was created with the value, CreateDeferredContext1 returns DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL.
Returns E_INVALIDARG if the ContextFlags parameter is invalid.
Returns E_OUTOFMEMORY if the application has exhausted available memory.

member.name: ID3D11Device1.CreateRasterizerState1
member.summary: Creates a rasterizer state object that informs the rasterizer stage how to behave and forces the sample count while UAV rendering or rasterizing.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that describes the rasterizer state.
Address of a pointer to the interface for the rasterizer state object created.
member.returns: This method returns E_OUTOFMEMORY if there is insufficient memory to create the rasterizer state object. See Direct3D 11 Return Codes for other possible return values.
